page.title: 15WOKINGHAM - EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Wokingham offers employment in various forms,though many people { {COMMUTE DAILY}to London, Reading or Bracknell. The area is committed to the{MANUFACTURE OF ELECTRONIC {EQUIPMENT,}for example ,Hewlett Packard. In addition there are many small computer software houses employing people thoughout the country. Light engineering is well represented, as is the manufacture of toys. As a busy town there are three large supermarkets and other retail outlets employing local people. Being in a rural setting there are many small market gardens meeting the needs of the community. Recently- growth in office space with nationally known companies having head offices here.{UNEMPLOYMENT}-7%, with labour shortages in electronics.
